title: More toxic than a teemo shroom.
body:
Pretty toxic game today. My boyfriend and I decided to play a game. A normal game. I don't play ranked, I only play for fun.I play normals so I won't be berated for my lack of diamond skill. I usually play support{{champion:37}} , today I played teemo{{champion:17}}  and my boyfriend was thresh{{champion:412}} . Thought it'd be fun. The lane was tough for sure, against a zil{{champion:26}}  and a tristana{{champion:18}} . I did ok, I didn't really feed them at all but we struggled getting bombed as I went in for any farm. The game was ok until our Fiora{{champion:114}}  became toxic. I wasn't even that bad as far as I could tell.  You miss a 'teamfight' where 3 of your team go in to fight while you're just trying to score a few more creepkills cause you have no gold from laning phase and suddenly you are the worst player in the entire existence of LoL.

I was called the worst teemo ever. I was called cancer. I was even called a c**t. Over and over and over.  I get discouraged sometimes... but never like this. Theres something missing from league community now. I have been playing for a few years and the toxicity levels in lol were reduced with the introduction of tribunal and little ribbons. Something between then and now has changed. I've considered leaving but I love the game.

What happened, summoners? Why can't I play something I don't usually play without getting abused?..IN NORMALS?

replies.body: because you didn't have the common sense to mute them.
Because you played Teemo. Everyone hates Teemo.

Everyone secretly enjoys playing Teemo. The abusive player was also guilty of playing Teemo. I saw their match history. You love to hate him but hate to love him.{{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}}

just stop playing. i pretty much did and my health pristine. i played a game today, it was terrible so i just left and not gonna play for a while. this game sucks a lot now so just stop playing.
I'd really like them to implement it soon, it's getting pretty bad on OCE especially.
As far as I'm concerned, you laned against a trist and a zilean as a not exactly meta adc and 'didn't really feed them at all' you my friend deserve a medal!!

It's going to get worse before it gets better. OCE server has never had a tribunal, and earlier this year they removed the tribunal from all servers while Riot works on the New Tribunal.

We wont see it for a few months yet.
